test.name: net.shipilev.concurrent.torture.tests.init.LongConstrTest
test.description: Tests if primitive long fields are properly initialized (in constructor).

case.description: Seeing the default value for long field. The update to the field in the constructor is lost. This is a legal JMM behavior.
The value set by the actor thread. Observer sees the complete update.
The observer sees the empty shell. This is a legal JMM behavior, since there is a race between actor and observer.

test.name: net.shipilev.concurrent.torture.tests.init.RacyPublicationTest
test.description: Tests the races during unsafe publication.

case.description: Seeing the object in fully-constructed way.
Observer sees null reference to the object. This is the correct case, since there is an intrinsic race between actor and observer.

unmatched.description: This should be under-uninitialized case. This is a correct JMM behavior.
